snippet.title: Mafia Thief Release Trailer | Official
snippet.description:
Mafia Thief is now available here: https://divisionsoftware.itch.io/mafia-thief

Mafia Thief is a third-person stealth game. Break in 6 unique missions into houses, mansions, a warehouse or a junkyard to steal more than 100 different items. Complete the missions and follow the story. Avoid security guards, residents and the police. Get ready for the thief experience of the year!

Music by Fuzzeke
